alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 07 at 11:59AM EST until January 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4239 7879 4243 7898 4255 7915 4257 7931 4232 7975 4201 7976 4205 7964 4220 7938 4225 7920 4224 7887 TIME Y22M01D07T0600Z-Y22M01D07T1200Z COORD...4223 7855 4242 7861 4246 7913 4238 7947 4225 7976 4199 7977 4199 7947 4201 7903 4209 7884 4205 7867 TIME Y22M01D07T1200Z-Y22M01D07T1800Z COORD...4232 7850 4237 7888 4247 7928 4239 7956 4225 7976 4199 7977 4202 7914 4200 7888 4204 7861 4216 7844 TIME Y22M01D07T1800Z-Y22M01D08T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
